Text:
The seeding didnt work first but now it does.
Sorry.

And start SEEDING after download, I have uploaded 1 TB of this torrent now and I wont keep it alive much longer. Its still quite badly seeded.

Its YOUR loss if you cant download it anymore.

Thx, I've been waiting for this torrent... unfortunately I live in Belgium where there is no unlimited download ( I only get 25gigs a month) so I can't really seed a lot.

Hopefully some people can enjoy the stupid adventures of these girls and see the beauty of this series as a antropologic, social experiment. 

Keep an open mind...
Well I live in Romania, so I'll seed this thing FOREVER once I download it.  Hat tip to ElDonBarto, I love this show precisely for the same reason!
Is there a way to get this on your iPod??
Many thanks.  I can't believe that I like this show, but I do.

This downloaded pretty quickly, I'm seeding now and will continue. I try to to seed to a ratio of 2 for everything I download. 

This show is so funny!
Is there a reason why I can't watch the season 1 ?

Thank you so much for upload. I was wondering if you could help me, when I play the second episode of the first series it says 'your player is broken or cannot play due to unexpected error'. Also, when I play the episodes the image sometimes freezes but the audio doesn't, this happens at 10 second intervals every 1-2 minutes.
